item.title: Return to Office Announcements: The Real Reason Your Best People Are So Upset
item.description: The COVID-19 pandemic sent shockwaves across the globe, forcing many organizations to shift from office-first to remote work almost overnight. Tech companies, in particular, seemed well-positioned to adapt to this change. Companies continued to grow and launch new products. However, as the world recovers and offices start to reopen, a number of high-profile tech companies are choosing to return to the office. Following in the footsteps of Amazon, Robinhood recently announced their return to the office just 18 months after declaring themselves a remote-first company.
